Condition: Birds with body parts in their names
Explanatory text: Body parts include back, beak, belly, bill, breast, cap, chin, collar, crest, crown, ear, eye, face, foot, head, leg, mouth, neck, rump, shoulder, tail, throat, toe, wattle, wing

Condition: Birds worth less than 4 points
Birds with a [flocking] power
Birds that eat [seed]
Explanatory text: Any bird with a [seed] symbol. The bird may also eat other kinds of food.

Condition: Birds that have at least 4 eggs laid on them
Birds with geography terms in their names
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, joiden nimissä on maantieteellisiä termejä
Explanatory text: Terms include American, Atlantic, Australasian, Australian, Baltimore, California, Canada, Carolina, Chihuahua, Corsican, Eastern, Eurasian, European, Inca, Mallee, Meadow, Mississippi, Moor, Mountain, New Holland, North, Northern, Pacific, Plains, Prairie, Sandhill, Savannah, Scrub, Sea, South, Western

Condition: Birds in your habitat with the fewest birds.
Explanatory text: Ties count: If you have 3 birds in each habitat, your habitat with the fewest birds has 3 birds.

Condition: Birds with [ground] nests
Explanatory text: Birds must have a [ground] or [star] nest symbol.

Condition: Birds with a [predator] power
Birds that eat [fish]
Explanatory text: Any bird with a [fish] symbol. The bird may also eat other kinds of food.

Condition: Birds that eat only [invertebrate]
Explanatory text: Any bird that has only [invertebrate] and no other food symbols.

Condition: Birds that can only live in [forest]
Birds named after a person
Explanatory text: Any bird with an 's in its name.

Condition: Birds with wingspans over 65 cm
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, joiden siipien kärkiväli on yli 65 cm

Condition: Birds with [cavity] nests
Explanatory text: Birds must have a [cavity] or [star] nest symbol.

Condition: Birds that eat [wild]
Explanatory text: Any bird that specifically has a [wild] symbol as part of its food cost.

Condition: Birds that have at least 1 egg laid on them
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, joilla on vähintään yksi muna

Condition: Birds with wingspans 30 cm or less
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, joiden siipien kärkiväli on 30 cm tai vähemmän

Condition: Birds with colors in their names
Explanatory text: Colors include ash, black, blue, bronze, brown, cerulean, chestnut, coal, crimson, ferruginous, gold, gray, grey, green, indigo, lazuli, orange, pink, purple, red, rose, roseate, ruby, ruddy, rufous, silver, snowy, sulphur, tawny, violet, white, yellow

Condition: Birds with [platform] nests
Explanatory text: Birds must have a [platform] or [star] nest symbol.

Condition: Birds that can only live in [grassland]
Birds that eat [rodent]
Explanatory text: Any bird with a [rodent] symbol. The bird may also eat other kinds of food.

Condition: Bird cards in hand at end of game
Birds that eat [fruit]
Explanatory text: Any bird with a [fruit] symbol. The bird may also eat other kinds of food.

Condition: Birds that can only live in [wetland]
Birds with [bowl] nests
Explanatory text: Birds must have a [bowl] or [star] nest symbol.

Condition: Birds that are worth 3 or 4 points
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, jotka ovat 3 tai 4 pisteen arvoisia
Explanatory text: The automa keeps up to 2 of them (higher value first).

Condition: Birds that are worth 5, 6, or 7 points
Explanatory text: The automa keeps the highest valued one.

Condition: For each column that contains birds with 3 different power colors:
SUOMEKSI: Jokaiselle sarakkeelle, joka sisältää lintuja kolmella eri voimavärillä:
Explanatory text: Birds with no power count as white.

Condition: Birds that can live in multiple habitats
SUOMEKSI: Linnut, jotka voivat elää useissa elinympäristöissä

Condition: Birds with tucked cards
Birds with a food cost of 3 food
In any one habitat:
Explanatory text: Birds with no power count as white.

Condition: Consecutive birds in [forest] with ascending or descending wingspans
SUOMEKSI: Peräkkäiset linnut [metsässä] nousevilla tai laskevilla siipien kärkivälillä

Condition: Consecutive birds in [grassland] with ascending or descending wingspans
SUOMEKSI: Peräkkäiset linnut [pellolla] nousevilla tai laskevilla siipien kärkivälillä

Condition: Sets of the 4 nest types / 1 set = [bowl] [cavity] [ground] [platform]
Explanatory text: Each star nest can be treated as any 1 nest type. No card can be part of more than 1 set.

Condition: Columns with a matching pair or trio of nests
SUOMEKSI: Sarakkeet, joissa on yhteensopiva pesäpari tai -kolmio
Explanatory text: Different columns may (but need not) score using different nest types. Star nests are wild, but each counts only once.

Condition: Consecutive birds in [wetland] with ascending or descending wingspans
SUOMEKSI: Peräkkäiset linnut [kosteikolla] nousevalla tai laskevalla siipien kärkivälillä
